detaileddescription.para: Macro for Dynamically Host Configuration Protocol disabled
Macro for Dynamically Host Configuration Protocol enabled
Macro for Dynamically Host Configuration Protocol acquired
Macro for Dynamically Host Configuration Protocol not acquired
Different IP status for the Network Configuration function callback

Type defining the prototype which Set IP function call back must conform to. This call back is called to notify the user when the IP is acquired following the call of WlanNetworkConfig_SetIpDhcp(). Returns the NCI IP status as a parameter

briefdescription.para: This API returns back the Ip address by the host name.

detaileddescription.para:
url The string pointer holding the host name
destAddr The variable in which IP address to be stored
RETCODE_OK IP address returned succesffuly
RETCODE_FAILURE Error occurred in fetching the ip address
RETCODE_NULL_POINTER if the input parameter passes NULL Example usage:

briefdescription.para: Function to handle WLAN IP settings. This function gets the IP settings after a Successful connection.
Function to get the IP status. This function return the IP status.
Function to convert an hexadecimal to IP.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t add3, uint8_t add2, uint8_t add1, uint8_t add0)
memberdef.name: WlanNetworkConfig_Ipv4Value

briefdescription.para: Function to convert an IP to hexadecimal.
Function to handle WLAN IP settings. This function sets the IP by using DHCP.
Function to handle WLAN IP settings. This function sets the static IP.

parameterdescription.para: Network configuration settings structure. Contains IP address, Gateway, DNS Server and DHCP information

simplesect.para: RETCODE_UNINITIALIZED - if WlanConnect_GetInitStatus failed by returning WLANCONNECT_NOT_INITIALZED.
RETCODE_FAILURE - if sl_NetCfgGet failed by returning NETWORKCONFIG_FAILURE.
RETCODE_FAILURE - if sl_Start failed by returning other than ROLE_STA.
